body_html:
Some additional data.
The line x = torch.Tensor([1, -2, 3, -4]) seems to default to [torch.FloatTensor of size 4]

import torch
x = torch.Tensor([1, -2, 3, -4])
x

1
-2
3
-4
[torch.FloatTensor of size 4]

If I changed that line to be
x = torch.ByteTensor([1, -2, 3, -4]) when testing with dtype np.uint8
the test passes

If I changed that line to be

the test passes
body:
Some additional data.
The line  x = torch.Tensor([1, -2, 3, -4])   seems to default to [torch.FloatTensor of size 4]
>>> import torch
>>> x = torch.Tensor([1, -2, 3, -4])
>>> x

 1
-2
 3
-4
[torch.FloatTensor of size 4]

If I changed that line to be 
x = torch.ByteTensor([1, -2, 3, -4])  when testing with dtype  np.uint8
the test passes
